DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial determine whether non-commercial soy protein product , consumed part low-saturated fat diet , reduce low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) concentration men woman mild moderate hypercholesterolemia , affect aspect related biomarkers .
